trans-unit.source: Create or update an autoscale setting
trans-unit.target: Create or update an autoscale setting

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="b919eaec-4cf3-4f1b-9cf7-ba7dfeaf0780#bk_common" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to autoscale settings.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="b919eaec-4cf3-4f1b-9cf7-ba7dfeaf0780#bk_common" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to autoscale settings.

trans-unit.source: Replace {autoscale-setting-name} with the name of the autoscale setting for which you want to create or update.
trans-unit.target: Replace {autoscale-setting-name} with the name of the autoscale setting for which you want to create or update.

trans-unit.source: The name of the autoscale setting.
trans-unit.target: The name of the autoscale setting.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that this is of type Microsoft.Insights/AutoscaleSettings
trans-unit.target: Specifies that this is of type Microsoft.Insights/AutoscaleSettings

trans-unit.source: Specifies the supported Azure location of the autoscale setting.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the supported Azure location of the autoscale setting.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>List all of the available geo-locations</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn790540.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>List all of the available geo-locations</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn790540.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The tags and their values that are used by the autoscale setting.
trans-unit.target: The tags and their values that are used by the autoscale setting.

trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of automatic scaling profiles that specify different scaling parameters for different time periods.
trans-unit.target: Contains a collection of automatic scaling profiles that specify different scaling parameters for different time periods.

trans-unit.source: A maximum of 20 profiles can be specified.
trans-unit.target: A maximum of 20 profiles can be specified.

trans-unit.source: The number of instances that can be used during this profile.
trans-unit.target: The number of instances that can be used during this profile.

trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of rules that provide the triggers and parameters for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Contains a collection of rules that provide the triggers and parameters for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: A maximum of 10 rules can be specified.
trans-unit.target: A maximum of 10 rules can be specified.

trans-unit.source: The trigger that results in a scaling action.
trans-unit.target: The trigger that results in a scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Specifies parameters for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies parameters for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: A specific date for the profile.
trans-unit.target: A specific date for the profile.

trans-unit.source: This element is not used if the Recurrence element is used.
trans-unit.target: This element is not used if the Recurrence element is used.

trans-unit.source: The repeating times at which this profile begins.
trans-unit.target: The repeating times at which this profile begins.

trans-unit.source: This element is not used if the FixedDate element is used.
trans-unit.target: This element is not used if the FixedDate element is used.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether automatic scaling is enabled for the resource.
trans-unit.target: Specifies whether automatic scaling is enabled for the resource.

trans-unit.source: The resource identifier of the resource that the autoscale setting should be added to.
trans-unit.target: The resource identifier of the resource that the autoscale setting should be added to.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the minimum number of instances that are available for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the minimum number of instances that are available for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of instances that are available for the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum number of instances that are available for the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of instances is limited by the cores that are available in the subscription.
trans-unit.target: The maximum number of instances is limited by the cores that are available in the subscription.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Management Portal to see the number of cores that are available in your subscription.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Management Portal to see the number of cores that are available in your subscription.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of instances that are available for scaling if metrics are not available for evaluation.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of instances that are available for scaling if metrics are not available for evaluation.

trans-unit.source: The default is only used if the current instance count is lower than the default.
trans-unit.target: The default is only used if the current instance count is lower than the default.

trans-unit.source: The name of the metric that defines what the rule monitors.
trans-unit.target: The name of the metric that defines what the rule monitors.

trans-unit.source: The resource identifier of the resource the rule monitors.
trans-unit.target: The resource identifier of the resource the rule monitors.

trans-unit.source: The granularity of metrics the rule monitors.
trans-unit.target: The granularity of metrics the rule monitors.

trans-unit.source: Must be one of the predefined values returned from metric definitions for the metric.
trans-unit.target: Must be one of the predefined values returned from metric definitions for the metric.

trans-unit.source: Must be between 12 hours and 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: Must be between 12 hours and 1 minute.

trans-unit.source: How the metrics from multiple instances are combined.
trans-unit.target: How the metrics from multiple instances are combined.

trans-unit.source: The range of time in which instance data is collected.
trans-unit.target: The range of time in which instance data is collected.

trans-unit.source: This value must be greater than the delay in metric collection, which can vary from resource-to-resource.
trans-unit.target: This value must be greater than the delay in metric collection, which can vary from resource-to-resource.

trans-unit.source: Must be between 12 hours and 5 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Must be between 12 hours and 5 minutes.

trans-unit.source: How the data that is collected should be combined over time.
trans-unit.target: How the data that is collected should be combined over time.

trans-unit.source: The operator that is used to compare the metric data and the threshold.
trans-unit.target: The operator that is used to compare the metric data and the threshold.

trans-unit.source: The threshold of the metric that triggers the scale action.
trans-unit.target: The threshold of the metric that triggers the scale action.

trans-unit.source: The type of action that should occur, this must be set to ChangeCount or PercentChangeCount.
trans-unit.target: The type of action that should occur, this must be set to ChangeCount or PercentChangeCount.

trans-unit.source: The number that is involved in the scaling action.
trans-unit.target: The number that is involved in the scaling action.

trans-unit.source: This value must be 1 or greater.
trans-unit.target: This value must be 1 or greater.

trans-unit.source: The amount of time to wait since the last scaling action before this action occurs.
trans-unit.target: The amount of time to wait since the last scaling action before this action occurs.

trans-unit.source: Must be between 1 week and 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: Must be between 1 week and 1 minute.

trans-unit.source: The time zone of the start and end times for the profile.
trans-unit.target: The time zone of the start and end times for the profile.

trans-unit.source: The start time for the profile.
trans-unit.target: The start time for the profile.

trans-unit.source: The end time for the profile.
trans-unit.target: The end time for the profile.

trans-unit.source: How often the schedule profile should take effect.
trans-unit.target: How often the schedule profile should take effect.

trans-unit.source: This value must be Week, meaning each week will have the same set of profiles.
trans-unit.target: This value must be Week, meaning each week will have the same set of profiles.

trans-unit.source: The scheduling constraints for when the profile begins.
trans-unit.target: The scheduling constraints for when the profile begins.

trans-unit.source: The time zone for the hours of the profile.
trans-unit.target: The time zone for the hours of the profile.

trans-unit.source: A collection of days that the profile takes effect on.
trans-unit.target: A collection of days that the profile takes effect on.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are Sunday through Saturday.
trans-unit.target: Possible values are Sunday through Saturday.

trans-unit.source: A collection of hours at which the profile takes effect at.
trans-unit.target: A collection of hours at which the profile takes effect at.

trans-unit.source: A collection of minutes at which the profile takes effect at.
trans-unit.target: A collection of minutes at which the profile takes effect at.
